\tThis application allows you to track your food supply in your kitchen and on the expiration dates of your products. \n\t You can add necessary items to your grocery list and search for the recipes on the internet. \n\tThere are two main categories for your kitchen items in this app - fridge and pantry items. You can add them separately to the appropriate storage place.
About the App
\tYou can add there food that you have in your fridge and freezer and specify the amount of it. \n\tFor each product you can set an expiration date if needed. Warning message will be printed for the items that have expired. \n\tYou can delete items from the fridge and choose to add item from your fridge to the grocery list.
\t Similarly as for the Fridge section, in the Pantry you can store food that should be stored in the pantry. \n\tExpiration status for the products will be shown: warning message will be printed for the items that have expired. \n\tYou can delete items from the pantry and choose to add item directly from your pantry to the shopping list.
\tIn this section you can search recipes on the internet by writing key ingredients. It is advised that you search recipes using ingredients with the closest expiration dates.
\tYou can add items to your Grocery List directly or choose to add them when removing from Fridge or Pantry. \n\tYou can check the items you have purchased and remove them from the shopping list.
\t You can change color scheme and Text Size in app by pressing buttons Color Scheme or Text Size and selecting from the list.
\t You can leave your feedback about this app in this section. \n\tYou can rate the app (from 1 to 5 stars), leave your comment (optional). This feedback will be accesible for all the users of this app, therefore your consent will be asked. \n\t If you don\'t want for other users to see your comment, you can opt for sending and e-mail to the developers of this app. In this case you will have to chose the type of the message and an app for sending this e-mail. \n\t Also sending e-mail is useful if there are questions to which you did not find answer in this Help section. \n\t You can also see other comments without leaving your feedback.
